fields.name: Voiceover (Passive):
fields.value: Each night, you will announce a random number of visits, based on your score. This will be a mod message formatted like so: "Narrator: Last night, the (role) (ability, past tense) (target)."

fields.name: Deveping Plot (Passive):
fields.value: Each night, you will learn one random role present in the game, besides the ones revealed in Voiceover. You may receive the same role multiple times.

fields.name: Main Character (1x, Charge 60%):
fields.value: Target a player. At least one of their actions is guaranteed to be included in your Voiceover.

fields.name: Alter Storyline (Locked, 1x):
fields.value: Unlocked when you place in the top 3. Send the host a mod message formatted like the one in Voiceover. Other players' actions will be altered as necessary for this to occur tonight. You will receive all feedback caused by the visit. This ability is astral and cannot be roleblocked.
